messages.content: What is the new option introduced in ComfyUI_IPAdapter_plus?
The new option 'unfold_batch' provides similar results to the original IPAdapter.
How does ComfyUI_IPAdapter_plus handle batches of latents and images?
It conditions each image/latent pair with the image and then uses the latent as input to a regular img2img.
How does the tiled IPAdapter differ from the regular IPAdapter?
The tiled IPAdapter creates a new conditioned model for each image in the batch, while the regular IPAdapter creates one conditioned model for the entire batch.
What are the limitations of the ComfyUI_IPAdapter_plus node?
The node relies on the IPAdapter code and shares its limitations.
How can I split and merge images using ComfyUI_IPAdapter_plus?
The node can be used in conjunction with the SimpleTile nodes to split and merge images.
